Operation 'discovery.apis.list' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details. Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks details about what data is returned, parameter options, and authentication requirements. Improved version specifies this lists Google APIs, mentions returned metadata, indicates parameter support, and clarifies authentication status for AI agent decision-making.

data.current_description: Retrieve the list of APIs supported at this endpoint.
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves a comprehensive list of all Google APIs available through the Discovery Service. Returns metadata for each API including name, version, and description. Supports optional filtering parameters to narrow results. No authentication required.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description is too generic and lacks details about what data is returned, parameter options, and authentication requirements. Improved version specifies this lists Google APIs, mentions returned metadata, indicates parameter support, and clarifies authentication status for AI agent decision-making.

message: Operation 'discovery.apis.getRest' has semantic quality issues: vague_summary, missing_input_details, missing_output_details, missing_context. Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about required parameters (api, version), return type (RestDescription), and use case. Improved version specifies path parameters, explains the RestDescription return object, and clarifies the operation's purpose for API discovery, enabling AI agents to understand when to use this operation.

data.current_description: Retrieve the description of a particular version of an api.
data.summary_suggestion: Get REST API description for specific version
data.description_suggestion: Retrieves the complete REST API description for a specified API and version. Returns a RestDescription object containing detailed information about all resources, methods, parameters, and schemas for that API version. Requires the API name and version as path parameters. Useful for discovering available endpoints and their specifications.
data.reasoning: Missing summary entirely. Description lacks clarity about required parameters (api, version), return type (RestDescription), and use case. Improved version specifies path parameters, explains the RestDescription return object, and clarifies the operation's purpose for API discovery, enabling AI agents to understand when to use this operation.
